entry.source: {F812}Hunter woman\0{F87A,70}{F813,1,403122}Slowly but surely, the Ring of Gaea is{F801}expanding their turf.{F801}{F802}Not only that, there's some new players{F801}in town from on up above the ceiling...{F801}{F802}Things are getting messy, I guess.{F801}Something big is about to happen,{F801}I can feel it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Chubby man\0{F87A,121}{F813,1,403601}The Ring of Gaea is way too preachy.{F801}Who gives a shit about all that stuff{F801}about who's the strongest?{F801}{F802}Tayama's no saint, but he set things{F801}up so a guy like me can get his fill.{F801}{F802}That's why I respect the Ashura-kai,{F801}you see?{F801}
